data.comment: The match has started.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Gamba drives forward and Takashi Usami gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 4, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Kim Young-Gwon (Gamba) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 5, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In Kobe Kobe attack through Andres Iniesta. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba's Hiroki Fujiharu breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Kobe.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 15, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Gamba.
Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Kobe are whistled for offside.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Gamba throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 23, Gamba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Gamba.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Kobe.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Gamba.
Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 35, Hiroki Fujiharu of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Yudai Yamamoto signals a Kobe throw-in in Gamba's half.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Yudai Yamamoto waits before resuming play because Yuji Ono for Gamba is still down.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 43, Shinya Yajima gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gamba.
Gamba's Yuji Ono is back in action after a slight knock.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Gamba.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Kyogo Furuhashi for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, Yudai Yamamoto awards Gamba a goal kick.
Yuji Ono for the away team is judged to be offside.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Kobe.
Kobe push forward at Noevir Stadium and Andres Iniesta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gamba defence.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Kobe.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kobe.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Genta Miura (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Gamba at Noevir Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kobe.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick Kobe.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Gamba.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Yuji Ono with Shu Kurata. This is the first substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Yuji Ono scores to make it 0-1 at Noevir Stadium.
Ryu Takao with an assist there.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 66, In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Daiju Sasaki with Yuta Goke.
Kobe drive upfield and Andres Iniesta gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 69, Yudai Yamamoto signals a Gamba throw-in in Kobe's half.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kobe are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 71, Junya Tanaka is on a sub for Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Ryu Takao is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kobe pushes forward through Junya Tanaka, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ryu Takao has recovered and rejoins the match in Kobe.
In the minute 74, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In the minute 75, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kobe.
Riku Matsuda (Gamba) gets a yellow card.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's fifth substitution at Noevir Stadium with Riku Matsuda replacing Ryu Takao.
At Noevir Stadium, Yuya Fukuda has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 76, Kobe to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Kyogo Furuhashi of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 78, Kobe's Andres Iniesta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Noevir Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Kobe are coming forward and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Kobe to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kobe.
It's now 0-2 in Kobe as Takashi Usami scores for Gamba.
In the minute 87, Gamba make their second substitution with Yuki Yamamoto replacing Yuya Fukuda.
Patric is replacing Kazuma Watanabe for the away team.
Keisuke Kurokawa is on a sub for Takashi Usami for Gamba.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
In Kobe Gamba drive forward through Patric. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Patric for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
